Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, if you wish to submit payment through a Personal Check/Money Order, you may make the check/Money Order payable to LegalZoom with the order number on the front of the check/Money Order and mail it to:
LegalZoom.com Attn: Billing 7083 Hollywood Blvd, Suite 180 Los Angeles, CA 90028
To receive an order number, which will be your confirmation number, please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 when you reach the Payment Page to receive further instructions on how to proceed and bypass the Payment Page.
Please note that we will begin processing your document once the payment has been received and approved.
We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
